sub_title: BI Engineer@Amazon EU HQ | Dual MS degree in CS | Major in ML/AI with minor in UX | Winners of MediaTek MobileHero, C Award, Accenture Tech Vision…
summary:
As an enthusiastic data scientist with deep backgrounds in EE, CS, design, and business, Yu-Wen is skilled at solving business problems with cross-domain knowledge. She specializes in business intelligence, machine learning, process mining, data visualization, product and user experience design. 

In addition to her ECE background, her passion in big data led her to pursue 3 master degrees in the field of data science: one master's degree in business analytics and two MSc degree in Computer Science at highly ranked universities in 3 different countries. She has also completed a business program at UC Berkeley when she was in the US.

Yu-Wen is a proactive, ambitious, and award-winning IT professional with a proven track record in working with the product team in IoT, medical device, digital health, and design consultancy industry.  

She is the winner of multiple international awards in entrepreneurship, technology, and business, including:
 - TOP 5 Talents in "Internship in the Valley" program out of 325 applicants from 13 universities in the Netherlands
 - First Prize in C Awards (national DataViz & Multimedia student competition) in Sweden
 - First Prize in MediaTek MobileHeroes(out of 334 teams, 1024 participants) in Asia
 - Final Delegates in "Young Entrepreneurs of the Future(YEF)" program: selected to visit globally top universities(Harvard, MIT, Stanford, and UC Berkeley) in the US
- Taiwanese Representative in "onTrack  Hackathon", held by Stanford Graduate School of Business & ITRI
- Academic Excellence Award(Taiwan), International Entrepreneurship Intern Scholarship(Israel), ...etc. 

Yu-Wen is driven and creative. She has experience in designing and developing smart devices and apps, ML/AI models, recommender systems, business predictive models, and interactive data visualization dashboard(by JS). She also obtained her first patent at the age of 22.

projects.title: Personalized Multi-rating Beer Recommender System
projects.description:
- Developed an algorithm that can handle multiple ratings by using correlation factors and collaborative filtering algorithms for personalized beer recommendations(Python).
- Built a back-end system based on the above algorithm to generate Top-N recommendations.

contributors.headline: BI Engineer@Amazon EU HQ | Dual MS degree in CS | Major in ML/AI with minor in UX | Winners of MediaTek MobileHero, C Award, Accenture Tech Vision…

projects.title: Implementation of Process for Finding Best Ensemble Tree Algorithm Based on User Preference
projects.description:
- Carried out a procedure by building a system that supports users to customize their desired hyperparameters and the preferred weights of the performance metrics by using python.
- Based on the inputs of the users and our built-in algorithms(from data preprocessing to evaluation),  the system capable of calculating the personalized rank of best ensemble tree algorithm.
- We also built a webpage that allows users to select their preferred preprocessing methods, validation methods, hyperparameters, weights of the performance metrics, and input their own datasets.

contributors.headline: BI Engineer@Amazon EU HQ | Dual MS degree in CS | Major in ML/AI with minor in UX | Winners of MediaTek MobileHero, C Award, Accenture Tech Vision…

profile_positions.description:
- LIT team(Launch, Innovation, and Tech Integration) at Amazon EMEA headquarter.
- Evaluated and visualized ML modeling projects for logistics planning with data science team.
- Completed ML/DL engineering trainings offered by AWS internally. 

Technologies: ETL, SQL, AWS (Redshift, Sagemaker, S3, Cloud, Quicksight), Python, HTML
Others: Scrum, Agile, Asana
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Worked in a global cross-functional agile team in a  Silicon Valley-based fashion AI company.
- Developed technical tracking functions and visualization dashboards to enable tracking of user engagement and acquisition for marketing, operations, and tech team
- Consulted with stakeholders to design metrics and experiments
- Conducted product analysis and market analysis for key product releases
- Provide insights and data-driven recommendations for the decision-makers.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
*Awarded Second Place in the Accenture Tech Vision program, 2021. 

Gained insight into Accenture Technology through presentations, networking and hands-on experience. Worked on a real-world technology challenge across 4-days, which focussed on:

• the software development lifecycle
• synthesis of technical architecture
• the importance of project management
• able to work in an agile environment and adapt to the needs of the project
• collaborated to ensure all areas of brief were covered
• delivered a timely solution to the technology challenge

Solution involved a presentation and tech demo using the AWS Cloud 9 to a panel of Accenture leadership who acted as clients on the final day.
profile_positions.title: Technology Visionaries Experience 2021

profile_positions.description:
Thesis Student @ AIS Research Group(Computer Science), Eindhoven University of Technology

- Specifications: Machine Learning, Process Mining, Business Intelligence, Data Visualization.
- Honor & Award: Top 5 Talents in "Internship in the Valley" program among  300+ applicants from 13 Dutch research Universities.
- Projects: Trace and activity prediction of business processes based on multiple machine learning models, Analysis of Penalized Cases for Inspection Enhancement using process mining.(Python, ProM, SAS, SQL, R, Disco)
profile_positions.title: Thesis Student

profile_positions.description:
Specifications: Business Analytics, Data Mining, Service design, Information system management.
- Honor & Award: Academic Excellence Award with Scholarship
- Duties: 
 • Qualitative research: user research, focus group, survey design, persona, interviews, field study. 
 • Quantitative research: data collection and preprocessing, feature engineering, statistical analysis, built machine learning models to predict users' purchasing behavior. (R, SPSS, RapidMiner, Smartpls)
- Achievements:
• Completed international data mining projects to analyze user behavior and built predictive models to make optimal and actionable strategies for MOOC companies.
• The research paper is under review by the journal.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Myndlift is an Israeli BrainTech company, developing an app-based neurofeedback system for drug-free ADHD/ADD solution. The two co-founders are Israeli Forbes30under30 members and the company was funded by 500 Startups and OCS.  
•	Responsible for qualitative and quantitative research: data analysis, business analysis, market research, user research, etc.
•	Completed a “China’s Neurology and ADHD Market Research & Analysis Report”; sourced suppliers and distributors; attended an international investment conference held by OCS(Israel innovation authority); interviewed by two magazines.
profile_positions.title: BA intern

profile_positions.description:
•	Organized and hosted a networking event in Tel Aviv to introduce Taiwan’s startup environment and promote Startup Global program
•	The event successfully attracted more than 100 Israeli entrepreneurs and further recruited a record high 77 teams from Israel to apply for the Startup Global program
profile_positions.title: Head Organizer of Startup Global Program Networking Event, TLV Israel

profile_positions.description:
A Taiwan-based developer of medical devices and testing instrument.
• Duties: designed interfaces and product functions based on research, managed and coordinated engineers to develop new products, devised marketing strategies, and presented products to Tech companies. 
• Led a team to complete the development of a medical testing instrument of the wearable healthcare product that monitors heart rate, SPO2 and blood pressure; a collaboration with MediaTek Inc.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Winner of the industry research project that combines 6-month industry research training with oversea field study in Israel.
• Industry Research Theme: Medical Device Industry in Israel
• Visited and interviewed with Israeli medical device companies and startups, incubators, technology transfer centers...etc; wrote a findings reports to the government and published on Global Bio & Investment Magazine.
profile_positions.title: Vice Director of Israel research Team

profile_positions.description:
ALCHEMA Smart Homebrewer, which enables users to easily brew fruit ciders at home.
• Designed the Android-based UX and functions of Alchema; connected manufacturers and brewing experts; conducted market research and analysis, wrote product proposal, and devised marketing strategy; managed and coordinated engineers and designers.
• Obtained a patent at the age of 22.
• Alchema won the first prize out of 1032 participants in the 2014 MediaTek Mobileheroes Competition in Asia.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Working as a tech translator to make the free coding resources accessible to young people around the world.
